spell_tooltip.description: Increases the range of your Aura by 30 yards and reduces the cooldown of Aura Mastery by 60 sec.
Call upon the light to blind enemy players in a 25 yd cone, causing enemies to miss their spells and attacks for 4 sec.
Your Consecration clears and suppresses all snare effects on allies within its area of effect.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 270,178 Holystrike damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After Cleanse Toxins successfully removes an effect from an ally, they are healed for 573,048.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 6 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 146,446 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Judgment on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Divine Toll's Judgment deals 100% increased damage.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 40%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.

Your Divine Hammer is 25% larger, and enemies within them have 30% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Shield of Vengeance, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath deals 50% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 5,527 every 0.8 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 250,157 Holy damage to an enemy, or 344,255 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 197,474.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec per Holy Power spent and restores 5% of your Mana.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 753,148 Holy damage and radiates 564,864 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.3 million and radiates 289,809 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
While above 80% health, Holy Shock's healing is increased 20%, but creates a heal absorb on you for 30% of the amount healed that prevents Beacon of Light from healing you until it has dissipated.

Judgment has a 100% chance to cast Consecration at the target's location.

The limit on Consecration does not apply to this effect.
After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 955,083 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.

Shield of the Righteous deals 153,451 damage to its first target struck.

Every 4 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn cost no Holy Power.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Light of the Martyr's health threshold is reduced to 70% and increases Holy Shock's healing by an additional 5% for every 5 sec Light of the Martyr is active, stacking up to 3 times.

While below 70% health, the light urgently heals you for 21,224 every 1 sec.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 280% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
Judgment heals you for 254,688 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock and Judgment by 2.0 sec.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Casting Wake of Ashes causes your next 2 Holy Power spending abilities to apply Dawnlight on your target, dealing 1 million Radiant damage or 1.1 million healing over 8 sec.

8% of Dawnlight's damage and healing radiates to nearby allies or enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 15% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 722,041 and an additional 254,316 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 35% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Hammer of Wrath and Divine Storm increased by 10%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the damage of your next Hammer of Wrath by 200% and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Hammer of Wrath and Divine Storm critical strikes cause the target to burn for an additional 72,473 Radiant damage over 4 sec.

After you cast Wake of Ashes, gain Divine Purpose.

 Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power spending ability is free and deals 10% increased damage and healing.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.
Divine Storm and Hammer of Wrath have a 20% chance to cast again at 50% effectiveness.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 90,974 Radiant damage to enemies or 5,931 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Radiant Glory applies up to 1 Dawnlight onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 269,384 Holystrike damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Forces an enemy target to meditate, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect.

Usable against Humanoids, Demons, Undead, Dragonkin, and Giants.
Leap atop your Charger for 6 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 146,446 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.

Divine Steed also grants Blessing of Freedom for 3.0 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Divine Toll's Judgment deals 100% increased damage.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by 30%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by 15%. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.
Armor increased by 40%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.

Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Shield of Vengeance, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
The duration of stun effects on you is reduced by 20%.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Melee and ranged attackers receive 41,227 Holy damage each time they strike you during Divine Protection and Divine Shield.
Flash of Light is 30% more effective on your allies and 40% of the healing done also heals you.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Your Flash of Light heals for an additional 50% when cast on a target affected by your Beacon of Light.

Imbue a friendly target with a Barrier of Faith, absorbing 530,601 damage for 12 sec. For the next 24 sec, Barrier of Faith accumulates 20% of effective healing from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spells. Every 6 sec, the accumulated healing becomes an absorb shield.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.

Releases the Light within yourself, healing 5 injured allies instantly and an injured ally every 0.8 sec for 20 sec within 40 yds for 37,248.

Allies healed also receive 12% increased healing from your Holy Light, Flash of Light, and Holy Shock spells for 12 sec.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Your auras restore 16,469 health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds every 2 sec.

While Aura Mastery is active, heals all allies within 40 yds and healing is increased by 20%.

Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.

Your Holy Shock, Flash of Light, and Holy Light spells extend the duration of Tyr's Deliverance on yourself when cast on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance.

Holy Shock: Extends 2.0 sec.

Flash of Light: Extends 4.0 sec.

 Holy Light: Extends 8.0 sec.

Tyr's Deliverance can be extended up to a maximum of 40 sec.

Every 5.0 sec, your next Dawnlight's damage or healing is increased by 5%, stacking up to 10 times.

Morning Star stacks twice as fast while out of combat.

Heals an ally for 722,041 and an additional 254,316 over 16 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Shield of Vengeance, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Allies are healed for 103,642 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 105,228 when the blessing ends.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 18,797.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Your auto attacks heal a nearby ally for 92,851.
Hammer of Wrath deals 50% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 5,527 every 0.8 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.
10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 255,402 Holy damage to an enemy, or 343,219 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 192,589.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Each Holy Power spent on Word of Glory increases the healing of your next Light of Dawn by 5%, up to a maximum of 45%.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 763,397 Holy damage and radiates 584,358 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.3 million and radiates 294,027 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
Aura Mastery also increases all healing received by party or raid members within 40 yards by 10%.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
While above 80% health, Holy Shock's healing is increased 20%, but creates a heal absorb on you for 30% of the amount healed that prevents Beacon of Light from healing you until it has dissipated.

Judgment has a 100% chance to cast Consecration at the target's location.

The limit on Consecration does not apply to this effect.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 955,083 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.
30% of Holy Shock's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 10% of your max health.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Light of the Martyr's health threshold is reduced to 70% and increases Holy Shock's healing by an additional 5% for every 5 sec Light of the Martyr is active, stacking up to 3 times.

While below 70% health, the light urgently heals you for 21,224 every 1 sec.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.

Judgment empowers your next Single target Holy Power ability to automatically activate Divine Storm with 25% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every 20 sec.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 280% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
Judgment heals you for 254,688 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Your auras restore 16,469 health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds every 2 sec.

While Aura Mastery is active, heals all allies within 40 yds and healing is increased by 20%.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 15% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 722,041 and an additional 254,316 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 35% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Hammer of Wrath and Divine Storm increased by 10%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the damage of your next Hammer of Wrath by 200% and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Hammer of Wrath and Divine Storm critical strikes cause the target to burn for an additional 72,473 Radiant damage over 4 sec.

After you cast Wake of Ashes, gain Divine Purpose.

 Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power spending ability is free and deals 10% increased damage and healing.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.
Divine Storm and Hammer of Wrath have a 20% chance to cast again at 50% effectiveness.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 90,974 Radiant damage to enemies or 5,931 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Radiant Glory applies up to 1 Dawnlight onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.

spell_tooltip.description: Eye for an Eye can now also trigger at 100% effectiveness from direct Magic damage.
Word of Glory's mana cost is reduced by 100% and now reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Freedom by 2 sec when cast, but its healing is reduced by 50% when cast on allies.
Empowers the friendly target with the spirit of the forgotten queen, causing the target to be immune to all damage for 10 sec.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 269,091 Holystrike damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Leap atop your Charger for 6 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 20% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Instantly cast Judgment on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Divine Toll's Judgment deals 100% increased damage.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 40%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Rebuke casts an extra Crusader Strike.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Judgment every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.

Your Divine Hammer is 25% larger, and enemies within them have 30% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Shield of Vengeance, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

You automatically cast Blessing of Sacrifice onto an ally within 40 yds when they are below 35% health and you are not in a loss of control effect.

This effect activates 100% of Blessing of Sacrifice's cooldown.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Word of Glory grants 20% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 10% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.5 sec.

Blessing of Dawn

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.
Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 92,061 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 2 additional nearby enemies.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 13,678 Holy damage to your attacker.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 19,927 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 32,889.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Shield of the Righteous increases your Strength and Stamina by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3.
When you avoid a melee attack or use Crusader Strike, you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield.
Every 3 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory cost no Holy Power. Maximum 2 stacks.
Your chance to block spells is increased by 8%.

Reduces all damage you take by 20% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Consecration's benefits persist for 4.0 seconds after you leave it.
Enemies struck by Avenger's Shield burn with holy fire, suffering 90,514 Radiant damage over 5 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec per Holy Power spent.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 30% block chance for 6 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Crusade cause each Holy Power spent to explode with Holy light for 24,705 damage to nearby enemies, and have 25% increased duration.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 79,058 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.

Wake of Ashes is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 1.3 million Holy damage and 925,194 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 65,823 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 10 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 125% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Wake of Ashes surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 10% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 5% of your maximum health, increased by 1% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Blade of Justice extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 12 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Templar's Verdict, Divine Storm and Divine Hammer calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.
Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 15% for 8 sec.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Wake of Ashes and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 50 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.

Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 79,058 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
